this is because default namespace will only be created when applying k8s. when applying k8s, it will create a default Profile at the end of the process, which in turn creates the default namespace.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/gabrielwen>@gabrielwen</denchmark-link> It looks like the code is trying to copy the GCP secret from namespace kubeflow to namespace kubeflow-programmerboo. If we didn't create the profile and therefore create the namespace kubeflow-programmerboo then why is it trying to copy the GCP secret?
Right but we need the platform first right <denchmark-link:https://github.com/gabrielwen>@gabrielwen</denchmark-link> ?

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/jlewi>@jlewi</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/holdenk>@holdenk</denchmark-link>
ok so I think the reason for this error is not because of the profile nor the namespace. It's because of this line:
Maybe it's better if we call ConfigPodDefault in k8s after k8s()? <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kunmingg>@kunmingg</denchmark-link> we talked about similar issue, what do you think?
